mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Sessions(session VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, uid BIGINT UNIQUE NOT NULL, expires BIGINT NOT NULL);
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Sessions (session, uid, expires) VALUES(#{session}, #{uid}, #{expires});
mapper.select: SELECT session as session, uid as uid, expires as expires FROM Sessions WHERE session = #{session};
